title: Shaukat Aziz – Keynote Speaker | London Speaker Bureau

organizations.name: Citibank
quotes: Mr Aziz’s long career with Citibank and his experiences as Prime Minister and Minister of Finance give him a unique perspective on geopolitical issues, international finance and the fluctuating global economy.

organizations.name: United States
quotes: Known for securing significant loans from the United States in return for support of the war against terror, Aziz restored Pakistan’s credibility in the global marketplace.
